portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Our developed works
portfolio.description: Explore some of our recent projects that showcase our expertise in web design and development.

projects.name: University Team Web Platform
projects.details: Creation of a website to promote the IPN Cuauhtémoc team, showcasing all the competitions they have participated in, along with their achievements and collaborating sponsors. The site is linked to their social media profiles, includes automatic carousels, and features a recruitment form connected to their contact information.

projects.name: Corporate Website for B2B Business
projects.details: Corporate website focused on leadership, innovation, and organizational transformation. It combines a modern design with vibrant colors (magenta, orange, green, and blue), clean typography, and a human-centered approach. Includes service sections, client showcases, dynamic blog, and an integrated Google Calendar booking system.

projects.name: Dress Rental and Business Management Platform
projects.details: Comprehensive project combining a public-facing website for dress rentals and beauty services with an internal business management system. The platform includes user and role management, booking calendar, inventory control, service management, sales tracking, and financial summaries. The public site showcases the dress catalog, additional services (makeup, hair styling, events), and an online booking system. The design features an elegant, feminine aesthetic with a soft pink palette, serif typography, and a user-focused interface.
features: Inventory control for dresses and services
Public catalog with filters and online booking

projects.name: Digital Menu for Restaurant
projects.details: Elegant website for a fine dining restaurant specializing in contemporary cuisine and artisanal wines. The design features warm tones, serif typography, and a minimalist layout that conveys sophistication and authenticity. Includes sections for the menu, online reservations, contact details, and the restaurant’s philosophy. Fully responsive and optimized for local SEO.
